sentences: Ma olen saanud head arvamust selle kohta.
Ta on saanud palju kiitust oma töö eest.
Nad on saanud teada, et see on hea võimalus.
context: The word 'saanud' is the past tense of the Estonian verb 'saama', which means to get or receive something. It is commonly used in sentences to indicate that someone has obtained or gotten something, such as an object, information, or a result.
